ctu.nengoros.modules.vivae.impl

Class SimpleControlledAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • ctu.nengoros.modules.vivae.impl.SimpleControlledAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VivaeAgent

    public class SimpleControlledAgent
extends java.lang.Object
implements VivaeAgent
    This is basic Vivae Agent controller. It connects ROS topics (publisher and subscriber) with the Nengo simulator. Publishes sensory data and its speed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SimpleControlledAgent(ctu.nengoros.modules.AsynNeuralModule myParent, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String pub, java.lang.String sub, int numSensors)
      Build agent, that is: create connections: ROS->Nengo and Nengo->ROS

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleControlledAgent

        public SimpleControlledAgent(ctu.nengoros.modules.AsynNeuralModule myParent,
                     java.lang.String name,
                     java.lang.String pub,
                     java.lang.String sub,
                     int numSensors)
                      throws ca.nengo.model.StructuralException
        Build agent, that is: create connections: ROS->Nengo and Nengo->ROS
        Parameters:
        myParent - SmartNeuron that is able to createEncoder/decoder
        name - name of the Agent
        pub - topic where the agent will be publishing
        sub - topic to which agent will be subscribed
        numSensors - length of vector of sensory data provided by the agent
        Throws:
        ca.nengo.model.StructuralException - if origin or termination (just created) are not found
